message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I think it's a fantastic opportunity for you to get your hands on this amazing product. I'm willing to offer it to you for $11000. I believe this is a great price considering the value it brings to your business.
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I'm looking to save as much as I can. I'm willing to pay $9500 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering the value it brings to my business.

Hi Bob, I understand your desire to save as much as you can, but I'm not willing to go as low as $9500. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $10500. I believe this is a fair compromise considering the value it brings to your business.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice, but I'm still looking to save as much as I can. I'm willing to pay $10200 for the product. I think this is a reasonable price considering the value it brings to my business.

Hi Bob, I understand your desire to save as much as you can, but I'm not willing to go as low as $10200. I'm willing to make one more compromise and offer the product to you for $10750. This is as close to your desired price as I'm willing to go, considering the value the product brings to your business.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $10000 for the product. This is my final offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.
